about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of the Master of All Spells, a legendary mage whose power and wisdom are unmatched. Returning to his tower after many perilous quests, he is shocked to find it occupied by enigmatic women. Each encounter with these women is a blend of battle and seduction, where victory brings not only satisfaction but the opportunity to delve deeper into the mysteries they conceal.

Dive into this captivating visual novel filled with spellbound anime aesthetics, where humor and intrigue blend seamlessly with a mystical, dark fantasy atmosphere. Uncover the motives of the characters as you reveal the dark secrets occurring within the tower.

Will you master both the art of magic and the passions of your heart?

The game also features a SWF mode for those who want to focus on the story or stream the game.


Engage in strategic turn-based combat where your magical prowess is put to the test. Cast spells by memorizing and selecting specific orbs from a chaotic array, challenging your concentration and reflexes.

Turn-Based Combat:
Encounters with the female guests initiate a turn-based combat sequence.

Spell Selection:
At the start of your turn, you choose a spell to cast.

Minigame for Spell Casting:
Once a spell is chosen, a minigame begins. This minigame involves a memory and reflex challenge:

Orb Appearance:
A number of orbs appear on the screen, flying around in chaotic patterns. For a brief moment, the specific orbs needed to successfully cast the spell are highlighted.

Memory Challenge:
After a few seconds, the highlights disappear. You must then remember which orbs were highlighted and click on the correct ones.

Success and Failure:
Successfully selecting the correct orbs allows the spell to be cast, affecting the opponent or yourself as intended. Failing to select the right orbs results in the spell fizzling out, wasting your turn.




JANE as a Knight Paladin


FAERLINA as the hottest Fire Mage


LEILA as a Bad Girl


ROSE & DAISY as Ancient Vampires


AND MORE... as something secret
